name: Technology
description: The technology industry encompasses companies involved in the development and production of hardware, software, and services related to computing and information technology.

name: Healthcare
description: The healthcare industry involves the provision of medical goods and services, including hospitals, pharmaceutical companies, and healthcare providers, focused on the well-being of individuals.

name: Automotive
description: The automotive industry comprises companies engaged in the design, manufacturing, and sale of motor vehicles, including cars, trucks, and motorcycles.

name: Finance
description: The finance industry covers a wide range of financial services, including banking, investment, insurance, and other related activities involved in managing and distributing money.

name: Retail
description: The retail industry involves the sale of goods and services to consumers through various channels, including brick-and-mortar stores, e-commerce, and mobile platforms.

name: Energy
description: The energy industry encompasses the production, distribution, and consumption of energy resources, including oil, gas, electricity, and renewable energy sources.

name: Agriculture
description: The agriculture industry involves the cultivation of crops, livestock farming, and related activities to produce food, fiber, and other products.

name: Entertainment
description: The entertainment industry includes companies engaged in the creation, production, and distribution of media and entertainment content, such as movies, music, and video games.

name: Telecommunications
description: The telecommunications industry provides communication services, including voice, data, and video transmission, through various technologies such as wired and wireless networks.

name: Construction
description: The construction industry involves the planning, design, and execution of building projects, including residential, commercial, and infrastructure development.
